title: World-Wide
text:
Florida lawmakers gave final approval to a bill that would end a special tax district that allows Disney to govern the land housing its theme parks, escalating a dispute with the company.

---

The American Petroleum Institute has drafted a proposal urging Congress to adopt a carbon tax, which would put a surcharge on gasoline and other fossil fuels to discourage greenhouse-gas emissions.

---

State governments will be able to spend $6.4 billion on cleaner transport projects under new Biden administration guidelines for use of federal infrastructure money aimed at cutting carbon emissions.

---

A federal judge temporarily halted enforcement of a new Kentucky abortion law that local clinics said had forced them to stop performing the procedure.

---

The Supreme Court, in an 8-1 ruling, upheld Congress's authority to deny some federal benefits to residents of Puerto Rico.

---

Public-health authorities in the U.S., the U.K. and elsewhere in Europe are investigating dozens of mysterious cases of severe hepatitis among young children.
